evidence
video link evidence
application to take evidence of overseas witnesses by video link
inconvenience in coming to australia shown in respect of two witnesses
no inconvenience shown in respect of other witnesses
whether the principle upon which the court now acts is that evidence at trial of an overseas witness may be given by video link unless good reason is shown to the contrary
differing views in the authorities
held

until the rules of court are amended to provide otherwise, it should be assumed that an overseas witness required for cross examination will attend in person to give evidence and that evidence by video link will be allowed only upon application supported by evidence showing a good reason for the witness not to attend in person.
